results.title: Jane Conquest magic lantern slides
results.brief_description:
Creator, York & Son, England. Two figures looking over cliff side to windswept sea and row boat.
Narrative for slide “…… until the image of a lifeboat plunging through the breakers showed that help was near and the reciter confirmed that the rescuers
´O´ercame each check and reached the wreck and saved the hapless crew.’”

results.title: Jane Conquest magic lantern slides
results.brief_description:
Creator, York & Son, England. Woman kneeling below church window, hand to head.
Narrative for slide “The clamour of an actual bell deafened the Kettering audience, ringing on and on……..”

results.title: Jane Conquest magic lantern slides
results.brief_description:
Creator, York & Son, England. Woman standing looking out church window.
Narrative for slide “Unable to open the heavy door, Jane climbed through a window, reached the belfry, and grasped the rope, ‘sole cord of hope’.”

results.title: Jane Conquest magic lantern slides
results.brief_description:
Creator, York & Son, England. Title slide.
Narrative for slide “‘Twas about the time of Christmas and many years ago,
When the sky was black with wrath and rack, and the earth was white with snow,
When loudly rang the tumult of winds and waves at strife,
In her house by the sea with her child on her knee, sat Harry Conquest’s wife.”

results.title: Magic lantern set effects slide (Scottish regiment army)
results.brief_description: Handpainted magic Lantern wooden slipping slide with [Scottish Regiment Army] imagery. When the slide is moved, the armies battle.

results.brief_description: Hand painted magic lantern slipping slide in a wooden frame. Newton & Co’s maker’s mark is stamped in to the wooden frame.

results.title: Magic lantern set effects slide (Blind man's bluff)
results.brief_description: Wooden magic lantern set effects slide with lever. When lever is moved upwards and downwards, a boy brushes glue on to a man’s back. Another boy is ready to attach a poster to the back.

results.title: Magic lantern set effects slide (Blind man's bluff)
results.brief_description: Wooden, handpainted magic lantern set effects slide with two slipping slides. The slide depicts a boy wearing a blindfold, when the slide is pulled left and right, girls move around him.
